detail_desc: Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and silk blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Brazilian briefs in cotton jersey with a high, elasticated waist, lined gusset, high-cut legs and high cut at the back.
Off-the-shoulder top in viscose jersey with elastication at the top and decorative buttons at the front. Long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs and an elasticated hem with a flounce.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Soft, non-wired bra in lace made from recycled nylon with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fitted vest top in ribbed cotton jersey with a V-neck front and back.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed stretch denim with a button fly and slim legs.

Single-breasted jacket woven in a wool blend with narrow notch lapels and two buttons at the front. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently shaped waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and ribbed sections at the sides. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut, slightly longer shirt in cool silk with a pointed collar and classic front. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, a yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Chest pocket with a button, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Seersucker dress in a narrow cut at the top with a gentle flare to the hem. Elasticated top, narrow shoulder straps and a rounded hem.
Trainers with a padded edge, lacing at the front and loop at the back. Cotton canvas insoles and rubber soles.

Calf-length dress in soft, patterned viscose jersey with a small stand-up collar and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with smocking and a narrow frill trim at the hems. Two slits at the front. Unlined.
Nightshirt in soft jersey with short sleeves and slits at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms in scuba fabric with a low waist.
A pair of chunky metal hoop earrings decorated with inset rhinestones. Diameter 3.3 cm.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and welt side pockets. Buttons at the cuffs and an adjustable tab at the sides.
Sleeveless lace dress with an opening and button at the back of the neck and an elasticated seam and decorative bow at the waist. Jersey lining.
Calf-length dress in a softly draping, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and diagonal buttons down the front. Short, smocked, frill-trimmed sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.

Cigarette trousers woven in a slightly stretchy viscose blend with a regular waist that has a decorative grosgrain bow at the front and wide elastication at the back. Side pockets and tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Blouse in a patterned weave with a small stand-up collar, sewn-in ties at the top, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Fine-knit gloves with matching fingerless gloves. The fingerless gloves have a print motif on the uppers. The gloves can be worn over each other or separately.
Sunglasses with sturdy plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Dungaree dress in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort. Adjustable straps with metal fasteners and patch front pockets.
Short, fitted dress in velour with sequined embroidery, shoulder pads and long sleeves. Lined.

Straight-cut coat in a soft wool and Tencel™ lyocell blend with notch lapels and a concealed double-breasted fastening at the front. Flap welt front pockets, diagonal front pockets and an inner pocket with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with sequined embroidery on the front, a heart-shaped button at the top and long sleeves.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Jumper in an airy, fine-knit cashmere blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Knee-length, 5-pocket skirt in washed, stretch denim with a zip fly and button and slit at the front. The skirt is made partly from recycled cotton.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif and short raglan sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Microfibre Brazilian briefs with laser-cut edges, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Straw hat with a grosgrain band. Lined. Width of brim 4 cm.
Wide, ankle-length trousers in wide-wale cotton corduroy with a high waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and straight legs.
Shorts in a crinkled viscose weave. High waist with covered elastication, decorative ties at the front and a small frill trim at the top.
5-pocket, ankle-length, slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with worn details that are patched inside. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length, pull-on trousers in an airy weave with a regular, elasticated waist, welt side pockets and fake back pockets. Loose fit with a fake fly and tapered legs with creases.
Coat in sturdy twill made from a wool blend with notch lapels and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Open chest pocket, three inner pockets and a single back vent. Satin lining.

Lightly padded parka in a cotton weave with a pile-lined drawstring hood, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, and concealed side pockets. Quilted lining.
Small hair elastics without metal clips, four of which are glittery.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem.
Cap in mesh and scuba fabric with a print motif and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Single-breasted coat in a wool blend with notch lapels, side pockets, an inner pocket, buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Fitted top in a fine rib knit with long sleeves and a ribbed neckline.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and smocked back. Seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.

Stylish coat woven in a wool blend with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Fastening with three buttons at the front, a chest pocket, diagonal welt pockets at the sides and two inner pockets, one at each side. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. The wool content of the coat and the polyester content of the lining are recycled.
Long-sleeved dresses in printed cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and flounced skirt.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft waffle-knit cotton blend with a zipped pocket on one sleeve.
Twill trousers with a concealed zip in the side, welt back pockets and asymmetric, flounced hems.
Short, wide dress in a viscose weave with short dolman sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.

Lightweight puffer jacket in woven fabric with a hood and discreet zip down the front with a chin guard. Pockets in the side seams with a concealed zip, and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Shorts in airy cotton seersucker with diagonal side pockets and elastication, a small frill trim and decorative, tasselled bow at the waist.
Round-necked T-shirt in organic cotton jersey.
Turtleneck top in softly draping, narrow-ribbed jersey with a sheen. Decorative metal buttons on one shoulder and long sleeves.
Puffer gilet with a detachable, faux shearling-lined hood. Zip with a chin guard at the front, welt front pockets and a rounded hem. Lined.
Bikini briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a fake fly, front and back pockets and slightly wider, tapered legs. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit.
Trousers in stretch twill with a high, elasticated waist and a concealed zip in one side. Fake welt pockets at the back and slim legs with creases and short slits at the hems.
Jacquard-patterned chiffon blouse in a straight cut with a collar, concealed fasteners at the front and cuffs, and slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved top in a crêpe weave with a lace yoke, round neckline, an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Boots in imitation leather with a discreet seam and lacing at the front, a loop at the back and a decorative welt seam around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Short, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and concealed zip and press-stud at one side. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Buttons at the back, a seam at the waist and a flared, glittery skirt in two layers of tulle. Lined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and fixed lacing at the sides.
Hipster briefs in jersey with a low waist, wide elastic waistband and lined gusset.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.

Waist bag in nylon with a large compartment and small zipped outer compartment at the front. Discreet zipped compartment at the back, one inner compartment and an adjustable waist strap in woven fabric with a metal carabiner hook at one end. Recycled polyester lining.
Running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband with a concealed drawstring, a zip at the hems and reflective details.
Shirt in an Oxford cotton weave with a button-down collar. Buttons down the front, an open chest pocket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Quilted top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton blend with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, darts at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Outdoor hat in breathable thermal fleece.
Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with short sleeves and a round neckline with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck. Unlined.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.

Rain mittens in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with sealed seams. Elastication at the top and an elastic strap with a press-stud around the wrists. Fleece lining. Size 2-6M with no thumbs. The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Non-wired push-up bralette in lace with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and no fasteners.
